subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With St. John’s trailing by a point, Avery Patterson made a 3-pointer with 1 minute 28 seconds left and turned it into a 4-point play because of a foul as St. John's went on to defeat Syracuse on Sunday.
snippet: With St. John’s trailing by a point, Avery Patterson made a 3-pointer with 1 minute 28 seconds left and turned it into a 4-point play because of a foul as St. John's went on to defeat Syracuse on Sunday.
